Name: 2D Physics Engine
Description:
I wanted to learn how collision works so I wrote an engine in Processing that created world\r\nblocks that a player could collide with. The movement is similar to Super Mario World and the jumping mechanics are similar to Donkey Kong Country.

\r\n

See on OpenProcessing

Name: Rest Client
Description: You authorize by logging\r\nin via Login method, access your resource, and make CRUD requests.

Name: Python Turtle Name
Description:
During Fall 2011 in Intro to C Programming we were given the option to code the last 2 assignments in Python instead of C, one of which involved using the Python Turtle to draw our names.

This was a graphics application that drew my name Joe Moceri using the python turtle.

See on GitHub
